result.markdown: --- title: "Rates and contingency tables" --- ### Content ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:-------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |4g |Rates and offsets |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w4g_offset.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/FLSAaWpHQso)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4g_offset.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4g_offset.R)| |4h |Logistic model for proportions |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w4h_proportions.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/pqkjnA708c8)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4h_proportions.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4h_proportions.R)| |5a |Introduction to correlated data |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w5a_intro.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/2LRzsxZPatQ)| | | ::: ::: ### In class: - [Poisson/binomial analysis for `sweden`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/60604A_Poisson.sas). - [Models for contingency tables (not covered)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/60604A_contingencytable.sas) - Rates - Exercise 4.3 (children ever born) - Overdispersion - slides (see Exercise 4.4 for an example)
